dict.acceptation: 快车；快车；专使；捷运公司；

sent.orig: Kakichi Express as a modern large-scale logistics enterprises, Shanghai Kakichi Express has a large fleet.
sent.trans: 佳吉快运作为现代化的大型第三方物流企业，上海佳吉快运拥有庞大的运输车队。

sent.orig: Here, express to express sympathy and solicitude for kindly and be thanked heartily sincerely.
sent.trans: 在此，谨表示亲切的慰问和衷心的感谢。

sent.orig: A synonym is a express those ways the alike thing as anotIT express.
sent.trans: 同义词意味着表达了和另唯一英语字词的共同点。

sent.orig: My father came here on an express train from express highway.
sent.trans: 我父亲搭快车从高速公路来这儿的。
